func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions using sympy, focusing on providing exact answers with fractions or radicals when possible.
func_sig.name: evaluate_math_expressions

func_sig.description: Solve math problems using sympy. Evaluate steps for differentiation, integration, and solving equations.
func_sig.name: solve_math_problem

func_sig.description: Evaluate the cross product of two 3D vectors given as lists or tuples.
func_sig.name: evaluate_cross_product

func_sig.description: Solve and transform trigonometric identities into simpler forms.
func_sig.name: solve_trigonometric_identity

func_sig.description: Evaluate expressions involving matrix operations like multiplication, addition, and inversion.
func_sig.name: evaluate_matrix_expression

matrix_a.description: The first matrix for the operation.

matrix_b.description: The second matrix, if needed, for operations like multiplication.

func_sig.description: Evaluate trigonometric expressions provided as strings, supporting operations like simplification and conversion of degrees to radians, as well as approximate numerical evaluations.
func_sig.name: evaluate_trig_expressions

expression.description: The trigonometric expression to evaluate, may include degree sign.
